entry.title: $2500 // *doorman/laundry/elevator!no credit check! 1 bed, 1 bath!king size bed
entry.content:
Apartments by owner, no fee!

-Prime Yorkville! Mid 70s and York Avenue. Close to subways and many parks, restaurants, nightlife, and so much more!
-P/T doorman, laundry, elevator building!
-Beautiful, cozy 1 bed, 1 bath featuring KING SIZE BEDROOM, hardwood floors, exposed brick, good light, nice closet space updated bathroom and full appliances!
-Easy approval, minimal documentation, NO CREDIT CHECK!! 2 months security, 1 month rent due at lease signing!
-All across, a beautiful apartment! NO PETS ALLOWED!
-Heat, hot water, gas included!

PLEASE RESPOND WITH CONTACT INFO FOR A PERSONAL VIEWING!!
